Name: Rclone-mount
Overview: Docker for Rclone FUSE mount feature (exposable to host and other docker containers, e.g. Plex, Nextcloud, glFTPd)

RCLONE_REMOTE_MOUNT.Name: RCLONE_REMOTE_MOUNT
RCLONE_REMOTE_MOUNT.Description: The destination that the data should be backed up to (must be the same name as specified in .rclone.conf. E.g. AmazonEncrypted:)

RCLONE_MOUNT_OPTIONS.Name: RCLONE_MOUNT_OPTIONS
RCLONE_MOUNT_OPTIONS.Description: Extra mount options that can be used, see: https://rclone.org/commands/rclone_mount/ . E.g.: --read-only --buffer-size=1G --max-read-ahead=200M --acd-templink-threshold=0 --dir-cache-time=60m --timeout=30s --contimeout=15s --retries=3 --low-level-retries=1 --stats=0 -v

RCLONE_CONFIG_PASS.Name: RCLONE_CONFIG_PASS
RCLONE_CONFIG_PASS.Description: The password for the .rclone.conf pass (if specified when creating the config file)

Config Path.Name: Config Path
Config Path.Description: The path where the .rclone.conf file is
